div.h2: Please click on the link below for information re: JCFA's response to Covid-19.
div.p:
The Louisiana Dept. of Education
https://louisianabelieves.com/

Centers for Disease Control & Prevention
https://www.cdc.gov/

JCFA Charter Schools provide a non-traditional pathway for Louisiana students to earn a high school diploma. JCFA’s curriculum features a low 10:1 student-teacher ratio, and blends on-line academics with daily in-class instruction. JCFA students attend school year-round, but are required to be in class for only 3.5 hours/day. Our flexible schedule allows students to maintain jobs, to support their families and communities, and to explore opportunities unavailable in traditional high school programs.

p.span: JCFA operates four schools with a singular mission: to provide students with an innovative way to earn a traditional high school diploma. JCFA offers students a self-paced, computer-based curriculum in a warm, welcoming environment.

div.p: JCFA is committed to providing a learning environment that allows our students to reach their potential. All students, especially at-risk students, are capable of excelling academically when given the support services they need to focus on their academic goals. Help us to create success one student at a time!

div.h2: JCFA offers a flexible alternative to traditional high schools.

div.p: JCFA graduates students with a high school diploma, not a GED
JCFA school days are four hours, freeing students for work and family.
JCFA's curriculum allows students to work at their own pace.

div.h1: READY TO TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR EDUCATION?
